name: NSCollectionLayoutSection
desc: A container that combines a set of groups into distinct visual groupings.

items.name: init(group: NSCollectionLayoutGroup)
items.desc: Creates a section containing the specified group.

items.name: static func list(using: UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration, layoutEnvironment: NSCollectionLayoutEnvironment) -> NSCollectionLayoutSection
items.desc: Creates a list section with the specified list configuration and layout environment.

items.name: var orthogonalScrollingBehavior: UICollectionLayoutSectionOrthogonalScrollingBehavior
items.desc: The section's scrolling behavior in relation to the main layout axis.

items.name: var interGroupSpacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The amount of space between the groups in the section.

items.name: var contentInsets: NSDirectionalEdgeInsets
items.desc: The amount of space between the content of the section and its boundaries.

items.name: var contentInsetsReference: UIContentInsetsReference
items.desc: The boundary to reference when defining content insets.

items.name: var supplementariesFollowContentInsets: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the section's supplementary items follow the specified content insets for the section.

items.name: enum UIContentInsetsReference
items.desc: Constants that describe the reference point of the content insets.

items.name: var boundarySupplementaryItems: [NSCollectionLayoutBoundarySupplementaryItem]
items.desc: An array of the supplementary items that are associated with the boundary edges of the section, such as headers and footers.

items.name: var decorationItems: [NSCollectionLayoutDecorationItem]
items.desc: An array of the decoration items that are anchored to the section, such as background decoration views.

items.name: var visibleItemsInvalidationHandler: NSCollectionLayoutSectionVisibleItemsInvalidationHandler?
items.desc: A closure called before each layout cycle to allow modification of the items in the section immediately before they are displayed.
